TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit DataProtectionPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class DataProtectionPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class DataProtectionPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 控制存取加密資料和記憶體的能力。

span.span: Controls the ability to access encrypted data and memory.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此權限用來控制加密資料和記憶體使用的功能和類別。This permission is used to control the ability to encrypt data and memory using the and classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會建立`None`（完全受限制） 或`Unrestricted`存取資料和記憶體。Creates either `None` (fully restricted) or `Unrestricted` access to data and memory. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用建構函式。The following code example shows the use of the constructor. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 建立並傳回目前權限的相同複本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
A copy of the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 複製的權限表示與原始的權限資源相同的存取權。A copy of the permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 程式碼範例會顯示不可示範其使用之方法的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，權限類別的方法所使用的安全性基礎結構。它們通常無法用在應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2/CPP/dataprotect.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2/CS/dataprotect.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2/VB/dataprotect.vb#5)]

summary.span: 透過 XML 編碼方式，重新建構具有特定狀態的權限。

span.span: Reconstructs a permission with a specific state from an XML encoding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重建物件所定義的 XML 編碼方式類別。The method reconstructs a object from an XML encoding defined by the class. 使用方法，將 XML 編碼，包括狀態資訊。Use the method to XML-encode the , including state information. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 程式碼範例會顯示不可示範其使用之方法的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，權限類別的方法所使用的安全性基礎結構。它們通常無法用在應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要與目前權限產生交集的權限。

span.span: A permission to intersect with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同類型。

span.span: It must be the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前權限與指定權限交集的權限。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限交集的新權限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集是空的，這個新使用權限為 。

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限的交集會描述一組共同兩者描述的作業的權限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 只有通過這兩個個別的使用權限的需求會通過交集。Only a demand that passes both individual permissions will pass the intersection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2/CPP/dataprotect.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2/CS/dataprotect.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2/VB/dataprotect.vb#10)]

exception.span: 不是 ，而且不會指定與目前使用權限相同型別的使用權限。

span.span: is not and does not specify a permission of the same type as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: 要測試子集關聯性的權限。

span.span: A permission to test for the subset relationship.

param.span: 這個權限必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: This permission must be the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 判斷目前權限是否為指定權限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果目前的使用權限是指定之使用權限的子集，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前權限在指定的權限中指定完全包含一組的作業，目前的權限會是所指定權限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained in the specified permission. 例如，權限存取是權限的子集存取。For example, a permission for access is a subset of a permission for access. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 程式碼範例會顯示不可示範其使用之方法的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，權限類別的方法所使用的安全性基礎結構。它們通常無法用在應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2/CPP/dataprotect.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2/CS/dataprotect.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2/VB/dataprotect.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsUnrestricted() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回值，指出目前的權限是否不受限制。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.

returns.span: 如果目前的使用權限為不受限制，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不受限制的權限，表示存取權限所保護的所有資源。An unrestricted permission represents access to all resources protected by the permission. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Union (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要與目前權限結合的權限，

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立目前權限與指定權限聯集的權限。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限聯集的新權限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呼叫的結果權限所代表的所有作業，代表目前權限和指定的權限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 傳遞其中一個權限的任何要求會傳遞它們的聯集。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 程式碼範例會顯示不可示範其使用之方法的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，權限類別的方法所使用的安全性基礎結構。它們通常無法用在應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications.
